overview: BURLESQUE EXTRAVAGANZA is a travel diary, a road movie into Burlesque world made by Grace Hall, during her tourn√©e between Europe and USA .The movie shows an undraped backstage and the real "behind the scene" of creating an act.This project also focuses on the stereotypes about women and on the modern world vision of women and sexuality. Burlesque is a real therapy who increases confidence and helps you to love yourself.
title: Burlesque Extravaganza
